jobDetails.title: Marketing Executive
jobDetails.tagsAndSkills: digital marketing,marketing strategies,channel sales,branding,direct marketing,business development,market research,media
jobDetails.jobDescription:
BSSITECH is looking for Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Develop and implement marketing strategies and campaigns.
  • Conduct market research to identify new opportunities.
  • Manage social media accounts and online presence.
  • Create and distribute promotional materials.
  • Organize and participate in marketing events and conferences.
  • Analyze marketing data and metrics to measure success.
  • Collaborate with the sales team to align marketing efforts.

jobDetails.title: Marketing/Sales Executive/Manager
jobDetails.tagsAndSkills: Sales And Marketing,Marketing,Marketing Strategy,Sales,Business Development,Sales executive activities,Marketing management,Development

ambitionBoxData.Title: Delhi Transport Corporation Reviews by Employees

jobDetails.jobDescription:
Candidate will be responsible for developing, executing and managing company's marketing efforts to promote its brand, products or services. Key job duties will include:

  • Identifying industry trends and incorporating new ideas into marketing strategy
  • Developing, managing, and executing quarterly or annual marketing plan (for the entire marketing department or your specialized area)
  • Defining and/or updating the key performance indicators (KPIs) relevant to marketing efforts, tracking success towards those goals, and providing accurate stakeholder updates
  • Conducting market research
  • Managing the company's public relations efforts

To Apply- Email on- hrd@drtcindia.com
